column4: hi, could someone help me? my onboard soundcard (nvidia nforce2) supports 6 channels (5.1) but i can only use 2; i tried several tutorials but found no solution
I have a similar problem. I have a SOundblaster that only shows 2 when I speaker test but when I put a movie in I get surround
so I tend to leave it. Have you tried that?
surround speakers dont make a noise, even if i play 5.1 test-wav or movie
